info.title: Shan Loray Beauty E-Commerce API
info.description: Complete REST API for the Shan Loray luxury beauty e-commerce platform

get.summary: Get all addresses for the authenticated user

post.summary: Add a product to the cart

get.summary: Get a single category by slug
Get a single collection with its products

422.description: Cannot be rescheduled or time not available

post.summary: Create an order from the user's cart (Checkout)

get.summary: Get all payment methods for the authenticated user

post.summary: Set a payment method as default

get.summary: Get products with filtering and sorting
Get a single product by slug
Get a specific specialist by slug
Get available time slots for a specialist on a given date

post.summary: Add a product to the wishlist
Toggle a product in the wishlist (add/remove)

delete.summary: Remove a product from the wishlist

get.summary: Check if a product is in the wishlist
Get wishlist product IDs for quick client-side checking
